ing: 1/2 (7 inch) wheel Brie cheese, cut into12 wedges
12 leaves fresh mint, or to taste
n: Red, White, and Blueberry and Brie
des: "This is a fun, festive fruit dish that we serve around the 4th of July. It's an easy and indulgent treat."
ins: Place Brie into individual ramekins or small bowls. Drizzle honey over the wedges; surround with blueberries and raspberries. Garnish with mint.
